resume: I'm a Front-end Developer, 23 years old, from the Dominican Republic and I specialize in using technologies such as HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, among others. Programming is my passion and I like to learn more in my daily life.
rekappDesc: Rekapp is a React App that allows you to create and share decks of something to study or review using cards with text, images and/or audio.
cipherDesc: App made in angular based on cryptoanalysis of frequencyto to solve random puzzles with famous quotes.
devShortcutDesc: Simple but fast visualizer of examples, allowing users to view, copy or download local examples or GitHub examples.
firebaseDesc: This is an articles react app which use autentication, firestore for save data and an API called cloudinary for save image.
name: Name
msgSent: The message has been send successfully
msgError: An error occurred while sending the message
